revision.comment: /* top */clean up, replaced: hynix → SK hynix (2), SK SK hynix → SK hynix (2)

}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "48.JN100.SGB" and "2012/02/29" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos.
It would seem that the processor used in this device is an ''[[Applied Micro]]'' product.
This board is the little brother of the [[Netgear WNDAP660|WNDAP660]].
